sn42.1:4.2: Atha kho caṇḍo gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.1:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho caṇḍo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.1:4.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn42.1:4.6: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti?
sn42.1:4.8: Rāgassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:4.11: Dosassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:4.14: Mohassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:4.16: Ayaṃ kho, gāmaṇi, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn42.1:5.1: Idha pana, gāmaṇi, ekaccassa rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn42.1:5.2: Rāgassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:5.5: Dosassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:5.8: Mohassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:5.10: Ayaṃ kho, gāmaṇi, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn42.1:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, caṇḍo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.1:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn42.1:6.6: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn42.1:6.7: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
